channel.title: Doctoral on Glenn Hoetker
channel.description: Recent content in Doctoral on Glenn Hoetker

item.title: Research Methods 2
item.description: The second class of the required methods series for strategy and OB students, following a more OB focused class. Syllabus Click here to download. Schedule and readings Click here to download.

item.title: Research Presentation Seminar
item.description: This class gives doctoral students a safe, structured environment in which to develop and present their research, as well as practice the craft of scholarly critique. Syllabus Click here to download.

item.title: Innovation Strategy
item.description: This was a 5 week special topics module for both our macro and micro students. Syllabus Click here to download.

item.title: Global Innovation
item.description: This doctoral seminar focused on technology and innovation at a global scale. Topics included national systems of innovation, R&D in the multinational corporation and innovation outside the developed economies. Syllabus Click here to download.

item.title: Strategy Process
item.description: I offered this class several times at Illinois. In addition to covering classic strategy process issues, we covered a little bit of Organization Theory, since it was otherwise not easily available to our students. Syllabus Click here to download.
